TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BindingElementExtensionElement extends System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement
Public MustInherit Class BindingElementExtensionElement Inherits ServiceModelExtensionElement

summary.span: 为使用计算机或应用程序配置文件中的自定义 实现提供支持。

span.span: Enables the use of a custom implementation from a machine or application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应该从 类中派生，以使用计算机或应用程序配置文件中的自定义 实现。You should derive from the class to use a custom implementation from a machine or application configuration file. 一旦创建了 实例，便会返回一个自定义绑定元素。Once a instance has been created, a custom binding element is returned. 您可以在应用程序配置文件中使用该 `` 元素，并将 type 特性设置为 类，并将 name 特性设置为自定义绑定元素。You can use this in an application configuration file by using the `` element and setting the type attribute to the class, and the name attribute to the custom binding element.

summary.span: 将指定绑定元素的内容应用到此绑定配置元素。

span.span: Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取表示自定义绑定元素的 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the object that represents the custom binding element.

value.span: 一个表示自定义绑定类型的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the custom binding type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写并实现 属性，以返回此 将其与配置系统相关联的自定义绑定元素的类型。Override and implement the property to return the type of the custom binding element this associates with the configuration system.
